verses.verse: Why, <S%G3606><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> calling, <S%G2821><s%> consider <S%G2657><s%> the Apostle <S%G652><s%> and High <S%G749><s%> Priest <S%G749><s%> of our profession, <S%G3671><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>
Who was faithful <S%G4103><s%> to him that appointed <S%G4160><s%> him, as also <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> was faithful in all <S%G3650><s%> his house. <S%G3624><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> man was counted <S%G515><s%> worthy <S%G515><s%> of more <S%G4119><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> inasmuch <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3745><s%> as he who has built <S%G2680><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> than the house. <S%G3624><s%>
For every <S%G3956><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is built <S%G2680><s%> by some <S%G5100><s%> man; but he that built <S%G2680><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things is God. <S%G2316><s%>

And Moses <S%G3475><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> was faithful <S%G4103><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> his house, <S%G3624><s%> as a servant, <S%G2324><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> things which were to be spoken <S%G2980><s%> after;

But Christ <S%G5547><s%> as a son <S%G5207><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> house; <S%G3624><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> are we, if <S%G1437><s%> we hold <S%G2722><s%> fast <S%G2722><s%> the confidence <S%G3954><s%> and the rejoicing <S%G2745><s%> of the hope <S%G1680><s%> firm <S%G949><s%> to the end. <S%G5056><s%>
Why <S%G1352><s%> (as the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> To day <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will hear <S%G191><s%> his voice, <S%G5456><s%>
Harden <S%G4645><s%> not your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> as in the provocation, <S%G3894><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of temptation <S%G3986><s%> in the wilderness: <S%G2048><s%>
When <S%G3756><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> me, proved <S%G1381><s%> me, and saw <S%G1492><s%> my works <S%G2041><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> I was grieved <S%G4360><s%> with that generation, <S%G1074><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> They do always <S%G104><s%> err <S%G4105><s%> in their heart; <S%G2588><s%> and they have not known <S%G1097><s%> my ways. <S%G3598><s%>
So <S%G5613><s%> I swore <S%G3660><s%> in my wrath, <S%G3709><s%> They shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my rest. <S%G2663><s%>)

Take heed, <S%G991><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> there be in any <S%G5100><s%> of you an evil <S%G4190><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> of unbelief, <S%G570><s%> in departing <S%G868><s%> from the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But exhort <S%G3870><s%> one <S%G1438><s%> another <S%G1438><s%> daily, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G2250><s%> while <S%G891><s%> <S%G3739><s%> it <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Today; <S%G4594><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> be hardened <S%G4645><s%> through the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>

For we are made <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we hold <S%G2722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of our confidence <S%G5287><s%> steadfast <S%G949><s%> to the end; <S%G5056><s%>

While <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> it is said, <S%G3004><s%> To day <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will hear <S%G191><s%> his voice, <S%G5456><s%> harden <S%G4645><s%> not your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> as in the provocation. <S%G3894><s%>

For some, <S%G5100><s%> when they had heard, <S%G191><s%> did provoke: <S%G3893><s%> however, <S%G235><s%> not all <S%G3956><s%> that came <S%G1831><s%> out of Egypt <S%G125><s%> by Moses. <S%G3475><s%>

But with whom <S%G5101><s%> was he grieved <S%G4360><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> years? <S%G2094><s%> was it not with them that had sinned, <S%G264><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> carcasses <S%G2966><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> in the wilderness? <S%G2048><s%>
And to whom <S%G5101><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> he that they should not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his rest, <S%G2663><s%> but to them that believed <S%G544><s%> not?
So <S%G2532><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> that they could <S%G1410><s%> not enter <S%G1525><s%> in because <S%G1223><s%> of unbelief. <S%G570><s%>
